name: Bonehead Blues, Pilot
description:
Bonehead Blues is an interactive, text-based adventure game with multiple paths and solutions. Inspired by '80s comedy films, enter a humorous noir adventure through the fictional town of Bonehead, New Mexico. You've got your work cut out for you, even as one of the town's finest deputies. Unfortunately for the citizenry, that bar is quite low.

Written and developed by Kalin R. Hanninen.
